com.marshalchen.common.ui

类 AutofitTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • com.marshalchen.common.ui.AutofitTextView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener

    public class AutofitTextView
extends android.widget.TextView
    A TextView that resizes it's text to be no larger than the width of the view.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • isSizeToFit

        public boolean isSizeToFit()
        返回:
        whether or not the text will be automatically resized to fit its constraints.

      • setSizeToFit

        public void setSizeToFit()
        Sets the property of this field (singleLine, to automatically resize the text to fit its constraints.

      • setSizeToFit

        public void setSizeToFit(boolean sizeToFit)
        If true, the text will automatically be resized to fit its constraints; if false, it will act like a normal TextView.
        参数:
        sizeToFit -

      • getTextSize

        public float getTextSize()
        覆盖:
        getTextSize 在类中 android.widget.TextView

      • setTextSize

        public void setTextSize(int unit,
               float size)
        覆盖:
        setTextSize 在类中 android.widget.TextView

      • getMinTextSize

        public float getMinTextSize()
        返回:
        the minimum size (in pixels) of the text size in this AutofitTextView

      • setMinTextSize

        public void setMinTextSize(int unit,
                  float minSize)
        Set the minimum text size to a given unit and value. See TypedValue for the possible dimension units.
        参数:
        unit - The desired dimension unit.
        minSize - The desired size in the given units.

      • setMinTextSize

        public void setMinTextSize(int minSize)
        Set the minimum text size to the given value, interpreted as "scaled pixel" units. This size is adjusted based on the current density and user font size preference.
        参数:
        minSize - The scaled pixel size.

      • getPrecision

        public float getPrecision()
        返回:
        the amount of precision used to calculate the correct text size to fit within it's bounds.

      • setPrecision

        public void setPrecision(float precision)
        Set the amount of precision used to calculate the correct text size to fit within it's bounds. Lower precision is more precise and takes more time.
        参数:
        precision - The amount of precision.

      • setLines

        public void setLines(int lines)
        覆盖:
        setLines 在类中 android.widget.TextView
